data.name: Ka: Keepers & Assassins
data.detailed_description:
Ka: Keepers & Assassins is dark fantasy multiplayer 3rd person battle arena game, 4 players against each other.
Collect three runes in a certain time and get them to the center of the arena, in the meantime it is necessary to find better gear against the opponents.

Join on Discord:



Gameplay:

The player in the lobby can choose from the "hero" character. After the minimum number of two is reached, the game can begin. they spawn at random positions. Gear and their keepers are spawned at time intervals, which must be destroyed. There are several places in the arena where such drops are made. Meanwhile, in other places, runes are also dropped at intervals, which must be obtained in order to win the game. These runes must be obtained by end of the playing time and bring to the center of the map.

After exceeding the time limit, the "timestriker" starts, which takes the life of every player except for the center.The player must know the arena, every "hero" function, every gear that drops, be fast and have luck.At the moment, the "hero" has one life, but each of them has hp-regeneration and a quick possibility to escape or hide.

During development, the technique of the game may change, it also depends on the community of players, which will suit them better.

Features:
- Atypical control
- 4x characters "heroes"
- 5x character level up (every interval)
- 30min. game match time limit
- 1x dark arena map
- 50+ gear items
- 5x drop time interval
- 8x rune spawn positions (random drop every interval)
- 14x gear items spawn positions (random drop every interval)
- 4x keepers (AI monsters)
- 112x keepers spawn positions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon RX 580 Series 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
